name: HIGH&LOW ～めざせ！ 26連勝！ 5000兆円への道～
name_original: HIGH&LOW ～めざせ！ 26連勝！ 5000兆円への道～
description:
This is Trump's HIGH & LOW game.

Compared to the card published on the left
If you think the card on the right is expensive (or higher), select "HIGH".
If you think it is low (less than), press "LOW" to proceed with the game.

If you win, you win and you get a prize (flavored).
After the second win, the prize money will double,
You can earn 5,000 trillion yen by winning 26 consecutive games.

Try sharing the number of wins with the number of wins ranking and the Twitter sharing function!

The deck will not be shuffled until it is used up, so
You can aim for a strange and high winning percentage of counting (times)!

Select HIGH on the K display! A scene like that may appear.

Cute character animations will color the game!
I want to play that mini game casually and happily!
We will answer such demand!

* The shuffle itself is completely random
* The lively characters are lively characters, so just because you choose which character does not mean that there is a difference in performance. The cards that come out are completely random.
* Earning money is just a game production. Please understand it.
